trait.name: Charge
text: If the dracotaur moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a bite attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 14 (4d6) piercing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The dracotaur makes two attacks. one with its bite and one with its claws or two with its longbow.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit.

action.name: Claws
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Lightning Arrow (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
text: The dracotaur shoots an arrow at a point it can see within 150 feet where it explodes into a 20-foot-radius sphere of lightning. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as damage much on a successful one.

action.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 56)
text: The dracotaur exhales lightning in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 33 (6d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
